subject: Mental Health
title: The Future of Depression Treatment
description: Learn The Future of Depression Treatment in one minute.

hook.text: Psychedelics, brain implants, and gene therapy may soon transform depression care.

buildup.text: Psilocybin trials show lasting improvement after just one or two supervised sessions.

discovery.text: Deep brain stimulation targets depression circuits with tiny electrical implants.

twist.text: Personalized medicine could match patients to the right treatment using blood tests.

climax.text: The goal is moving from trial-and-error to precision psychiatry within a decade.

punchline.text: The next era of depression treatment is already beginning.

quiz.question: What psychedelic compound has shown promise for depression?
